headline: Show HN: Employees.fyi – Easily compare U.S. workforce demographic data
description:
Hi HN! We built Employees.fyi to make it easy to compare U.S. workforce demographic data across companies and against industry reference data.

In the U.S., the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) requires the collection and submission of demographic workforce data. We collected and organized the publicly available federal data from the EEOC as well as publicly available EEO-1 submissions from individual companies. By doing so, we hope to make it easy to compare U.S. workforce demographic data across companies and against industry reference data.

The URL contains your current selection. Just copy the URL and share it!

Some examples:

* A comparison of 2018 data for the "Professionals" job category across the Information industry, Facebook, and Netflix: https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=PROFESSIONALS&reference...

* A comparison of 2018 data for all job categories across the Finance and Insurance industry, BlackRock, and PayPal: https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=ALL&reference=52&compan...

* A comparison of 2018 data for the "Exec/Sr Officials & Managers" category across the Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services industry, Accenture, and Nvidia: https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=SRMANAGERS&reference=54...

If there's a company with EEO-1 data that you would like to see, consider submitting a URL via this form: https://forms.gle/8cVfXpg69fiiemzc8

Let us know what feedback you have for us! For those who are curious: at runtime, Employees.fyi uses normalize.css and the Open Sans font. They are hosted with the website.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Employees.fyi - 轻松比较美国的劳动力人口数据
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Employees.fyi - 輕鬆比較美國的勞動力人口數據
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN! 我们建立Employees.fyi的目的是为了方便比较美国各公司的劳动力人口数据和行业参考数据。

在美国，平等就业机会委员会（EEOC）要求收集和提交劳动力人口数据。我们收集并整理了来自EEOC的公开可用的联邦数据，以及个别公司提交的公开可用的EEO-1数据。通过这样做，我们希望能够方便地比较美国各公司的劳动力人口数据，并与行业参考数据进行比较。

URL包含您当前的选择。只需复制URL并分享它！

一些例子：

* 2018年信息行业、Facebook和Netflix的"专业人士"工作类别的数据比较。https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=PROFESSIONALS&reference...

* 对金融和保险业、贝莱德和贝宝所有工作类别的2018年数据进行比较。https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=ALL&reference=52&company...

* 跨专业、科学和技术服务行业、埃森哲和Nvidia的"Exec/Gr Officials & Managers" 类别2018年数据比较。https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=SRMANAGERS&reference=54...

If there's a company with EEO-1 data that you would like to see, consider submitting a URL via this form: https://forms.gle/8cVfXpg69fiiemzc8

Let us know what feedback you have for us! 对于那些好奇的人：在运行时，Employees.fyi使用normalize.css和Open Sans字体。它们是与网站一起托管的。
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，HN! 我們建立Employees.fyi的目的是為了方便比較美國各公司的勞動力人口數據和行業參考數據。

在美國，平等就業機會委員會（EEOC）要求收集和提交勞動力人口數據。我們收集並整理了來自EEOC的公開可用的聯邦數據，以及個別公司提交的公開可用的EEO-1數據。通過這樣做，我們希望能夠方便地比較美國各公司的勞動力人口數據，並與行業參考數據進行比較。

URL包含您當前的選擇。只需複製URL並分享它！

一些例子：

* 2018年信息行業、Facebook和Netflix的"專業人士"工作類別的數據比較。https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=PROFESSIONALS&reference...

* 對金融和保險業、貝萊德和貝寶所有工作類別的2018年數據進行比較。https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=ALL&reference=52&company...

* 跨專業、科學和技術服務行業、埃森哲和Nvidia的"Exec/Gr Officials & Managers" 類別2018年數據比較。https://employees.fyi/?year=2018&job=SRMANAGERS&reference=54...

If there's a company with EEO-1 data that you would like to see, consider submitting a URL via this form: https://forms.gle/8cVfXpg69fiiemzc8

Let us know what feedback you have for us! 對於那些好奇的人：在運行時，Employees.fyi使用normalize.css和Open Sans字體。它們是與網站一起託管的。
